heading: Political cartoons.
general-note: Here are entered works on the history and art of drawing political cartoons. Works consisting of general collections of political cartoons are entered under. World politics--Caricatures and cartoons.. Works consisting of collections of political cartoons pertaining to a specific region, country, city, etc., are entered under the name of the place with subdivision. History--Caricatures and cartoons. or. Politics and government--Caricatures and cartoons..
